text: Eghtɨ gumazitam bizitam irebamɨn mɨn bizimɨn ganigh, egh kamaghɨn a uabɨra uan ziam fɨtɨ, ia an akam baraghan markɨ. Gumazir kam suam, ia uarigh ifarɨva uari dɨkabɨnɨva egh enselbar ziaba fɨ. Eghtɨ ia an akam baraghan markɨ. Gumazir kam a uan nɨghnɨzim ko navir ghurimɨn arazibar gɨn ghua, egha pura mɨgɨa ghaze, kɨ uabɨ bar fo. Eghtɨ ia gumazir kamagh amitam ateghtɨ a ia dɨkabɨragh, ian ivezir aghuim okɨman kogham.
